scripts.lint: tsc --noEmit -p packages/core/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/importers/airbnb/v1/tsconfig.json && cd apps/web && bun astro check
scripts.typecheck: tsc --noEmit -p packages/core/tsconfig.json && tsc --noEmit -p packages/importers/airbnb/v1/tsconfig.json && cd apps/web && bun astro check
scripts.e2e: echo 'No e2e tests yet (alpha: packages-only, no frontend)'
scripts.pages:dev: bun run build:web && cd apps/web && bunx wrangler pages dev dist
scripts.pages:deploy: bun run build:web && cd apps/web && bunx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name ${CF_PAGES_PROJECT_NAME:?Set CF_PAGES_PROJECT_NAME}
